title: Gilded Age Servants and Heiresses, Revisited
description:
We double time travel back to the Gilded Age and The House of Wood, 2011, for this combined revisit to look at the lives of servants and heiresses who shared a roof but whose lives were very, very different.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
itunes:title: Gilded Age Servants and Heiresses, Revisited
itunes:summary: Dazzling Gilded Age heiresses and the servants who kept their houses running and in pristine condition.
